name: ridged crochet hat
sizes_available: finished hat size: 20” (22”) [51 (56) cm] in circumference
notes:
[super saver solids](/yarns/library/red-heart-super-saver-solids) labels with the photo have both spanish & english instructions.

notes
the ch-2 worked at the beginning of a round does not count as a stitch. do not turn at the end of each round.

hook used: 
5.0mm [us h-8] for size medium or 6.0mm [us j-10] for size large

[en español][1]


  [1]: http://www.redheart.mx/instrucciones-gratis/gorro-de-crochet-con-crestas
